Ther goth a brok and ouer that a brigge
Vp on the which brok ther stonte a mylle
And this is verry soth that y you telle
A Miller ther was dwellyng many day
As any pecok he was proude and gay
Pypen he koude and fissh and nettes beete
And torne coppes and wel wraslen and sheete
Ay by his belt he bar a longe panade
And of a swerd ful trenchant was the blade
A Ioli popper bar he in his poche
Ther was no man for ꝑperil derste hym toche
A shefeld thwitel bar he in his hose
Round was his face and camused was his nose
And piled as an ape was his sculle
He was a market beter atte fulle
Ther dorst no wight hand vp on him legge
That he ne swor he shold a non a begge
A Theef he was for sooth of corne and mele
And that a sleigh and vsaunt for to stele
His name was hoten deynous Symkyn
A wif he hadde comen of noble kyn
The ꝑperson of the toun hir fader was
With her he yaf ful many a panne a bras
For that Symkyn sholde in his blood allye
She was y fostred in a Nonnerye
For Symkyn wold no wif he seide
But she were wel ynorysshed and a mayde
To saue his a state of yemanrye
And she was proud and pert as is a pie
A ful fayre sight was vp on hem two
